explanations.b: Correct Answer.shx is the index file that stores the index of the feature geometry
explanations.c: Shapefile index file is the index file that stores the index of the feature geometry
explanations.d: Shapefile index file is the index file that stores the index of the feature geometry

questions.question: _________ are used to represent elevation or other continuously changing values.

explanations.a: Correct Answer. Contour line is drawn on a topographic map to indicate ground elevation or depression.
explanations.b: Topographic lines show the shape of the land the mountains, valleys, and plains by means of brown contour lines
explanations.c: Contour line is drawn on a topographic map to indicate ground elevation or depression.
explanations.d: Contour line is drawn on a topographic map to indicate ground elevation or depression.

questions.question: Slivers are gaps in a digitized polygon layer where the adjoining polygons have gaps between them. Say True or False

explanations.a: Correct Answer. Slivers are small, narrow, polygon feature that appears along the borders of polygons following the overlay of two or more geographic datasets
explanations.b: Slivers are small, narrow, polygon feature that appears along the borders of polygons following the overlay of two or more geographic datasetsekSAAA

questions.question: ___________  can occur when a line feature such as a road does not meet another road exactly at an intersection.

explanations.a: Correct Answer. Overshoot can occur when a line feature such as a road does not meet another road exactly at an intersection.
explanations.b: Undershoot is when line falls short of another line that it should intersect.

questions.question: A point feature has an X, Y, and optionally, Z value. The X and Y values will depend on the Coordinate Reference System (CRS). Say True or False

explanations.a: Correct Answer. The X and Y values will denote Longitude and Latitude
explanations.b: The X and Y values will denote Longitude and Latitude
